con:testCase.name: BadCase-DEV-redeemVoucher-DRC-Errors
con:testCase.con:description:
Tests correct error codes derived from specification in for DRC in SVN: ...SRs/Interfaces/MCE/ST_OVD_Portal_DP_DRC_U-036_MCE_IFS.pdf ยง 3.4.3 3.4.3 Result
Code of the result. Possible values: 0 - Operation successful 1 - Duplicated: A request with the same data was already successfully processed Element | Mandatory | Description service 1000 - MSISDN invalid 1001 - VOUCHER CODE invalid 1002 - No service provider found for given MSISDN 1003 - Service provider does not have permission for using of this 1004 - Voucher used up 1005 - Voucher expired 1006 - All other validation errors 1007 - IN account for given MSISDN expired or invalid 2000 - Already in progress: a request with the same data is currently processing by another thread 2010 - External application unavailable 2020 - Error delivered from Piranha application 2040 - Error delivered from OCS application 2050 - Error delivered from VoMS application

con:elements.con:expectedValue: WebServiceException occurred during ws client call
